title: Raphaël Paul Feser
text:
Professional Experiences

Aug 2022 - Dec 2022 | Trainee Pharmacist - Pharmacie de L’IleStage en Pharmacie qui fait parti intégrante de mon cursus Pharm.D ou je suis au front du pb des shortages
Aug 2022 - Dec 2022 | Master’s Thesis - University College LondonInvestigated the binding and the effect of a drug in the LHCGR using homology modeling and MD simulation
Aug 2022 - Dec 2022 | Student Research Assistant - UNIGEcondicting various project in applied statisctis and providing support for data analysis and data wrangling of external collaborators
Aug 2022 - Dec 2022 | Research Internship - MIAI studied the efficacy of sentinel lymph node biopsy in melanoma patients using the largest melanoma dataset in the world, using various statistical modelling approaches. 
Jan 2021 - Apr 2021| Open Synthesis Network - DNDi I prepared fragrance blends from laboratory compounds and in-house technologies for home care, body care and fine perfumery
Aug 2022 - Dec 2022| Laboratory Assistant - Firmenich I prepared fragrance blends from laboratory compounds and in-house technologies for home care, body care and fine perfumery

title: Raphaël Paul Feser
text:
Advocacy and Volunteerism

Aug 2022 | Vice-Chairperson of the 4th IPSF EuRO SymposimI was appointed Vice-Chairperson in a team of 20 motivated student to organize a educative event gathering students from all over Europe.
Mai 2022 | Guest Speaker at 132. BVT - Leipzig I participated to the national weekend of BPhD (German Pharmacy Student’s Association) speaking about student involvement opportunities at the european and wordwide level
Mai 2022 | Delegate at the Geneva Health Forum 2022 I was at the Fight the Fake Alliance’s Booth speaking about the challenges and issues associated with substandard and falsified medicines.
Jan 2022 | Head of Public Relations - asep I was elected as an Executive at asep (Swiss Pharmacy Student’s Association), responsible for maintaning a good image and developping the association’s relations to external stakeholders 
Oct 2021 | Delegate at the 43rd EPSA Annual Congress - Lyon I prepared fragrance blends from laboratory compounds and in-house technologies for home care, body care and fine perfumery
Oct 2021  | Guest Speaker at PsyKo 2021 - Leysins held a workshop on the pharmacy and pharmaceutical sciences aspect on troubles such as depression and pharmacology. to promote interprofessionality
Aug 2021  | Delegate at the 66th IPSF World COngress - Seoul I prepared fragrance blends from laboratory compounds and in-house technologies for home care, body care and fine perfumery
Feb 2021 | Co-Host of the Digital Health Panel Discussion involving speakers start up, professor, and students … question response etc smooth organization
Jan 2021  | Contact Person to IPSF Elected to represent asep at IPSF and … activities
